Articles.Content:
and wants to see the little prince's planet from Randall's what-if?

http://what-if.xkcd.com/68/

i would fly there so hard.
It started deteriorating some time ago. It's pretty boring these days.
I read XKCD religiously. Wait, no, scientifically.

The comics are great, but the What Ifs are starting to get kinda dull.

I WANT MY SPACE BOEING
The comics are sometimes too obscure, with too narrow niches, so only a dedicated few can understand them. They're usually interesting.
